name: Gallic's Rescue
description:
How to play :

Send your villagers to different quests/missions to rescue other villagers that will help you or to hunt boars to feed your village. Be prudent, some villagers can be captured or killed, so if you send too little of them the mission could fail.

When they come back they'll be more hungry so keep a good look on your food reserves or they will starve and fight between themselves.

If that happens you can feed them or send the bard to calm them. You will get another one each time you completed 3 quests.

Credits
